## writeFileJson() function

Transform a data object to a string and write it to the specified path.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function writeFileJson(path: string, object: object): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> | path to write the file to |
|  object | <code>object</code> | object to transform to JSON and write |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
